# Correlations

List of parameter correlations that are higher than 0.5 or lower than -0.5

```{r correlations, echo=FALSE, message=TRUE, warning=TRUE}
a <- corr.test(stat,adjust="none")
corelation <- round(a$r,2)
list_cor = matrix(nrow=0,ncol=3)
for(a in 1:length(corelation[,1])){
  for(b in 1:length(corelation[,1])){
    if(!is.na(corelation[a,b])){
      if((a<b)&&((corelation[a,b] >= 0.3)||(corelation[a,b] <= -0.3))){
        list_cor <- rbind(list_cor,c(row.names(corelation)[a],colnames(corelation)[b],corelation[a,b]))
      }
    }
  }
}
write.table(format(list_cor[order(list_cor[,3],decreasing=TRUE),],justify="left"),quote = F,row.names = FALSE,col.names=FALSE)
```

```{r plots, echo=FALSE}
#l <- 10
l <- length(colnames(stat))
for(a in 1:l){
  for(b in 1:l){
    if(a<b){
      print(qplot(y=stat[a], x=stat[b],xlab=colnames(stat)[b],ylab = colnames(stat)[a]))
    }
  }
}
```
